website_summaries.verdict: This elegantly modern wine glass is a must-have for dinner parties and families with small children.
pros: Crafted of unbreakable, BPA-free Tritan copolyester rather than cheap plastic
Safe to use for drinks other than wine
Customers rave over their eye-catching design
cons: Thicker glass than some customers desired

customer_reviews.title: Good for drinking wine out of
customer_reviews.text: Impeccable snifters for the wino in your life. These glasses are truly unbreakable, as witnessed after tearing open our 2nd box of Pinot while falling off the couch and landing on my three-year-old's Duplo building blocks (also unbreakable). There's no greater feeling than smashing your stemware in the neighbor's driveway at four in the morning while screaming the virtues of the Vivocci Elegent Plastic glasses, even if the police tazing you in front of your disappointed mother-in-law (who refuses to stop crying) is the last thing you remember before waking up next to a man with a raccoon neck tattoo in the county clink. Five stars. Must have.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Koehler

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly close to a "real glass feel" - yay!!
customer_reviews.text: Very much like a real glass goblet! In the attached pic, the Vivocci goblet is on the left, a glass goblet is on the right. I purchased these unbreakable wine goblets for full time RV'ing and enjoying the finer things in life - like wine!. I'm a bit if a glassware snob, and really do not enjoy the feel of a plastic cup rim against my lips. These Vivocci stemless wine goblets are the exception - they are really nice to drink from. I recommend washing them by hand to preserve the quality. I would buy them again (and likely will, since I got four as an experiment before investing in a full set).
customer_reviews.author: JanaJ

customer_reviews.title: clouded and impossible to remove marks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a set of 8 and a set of 4, placed them in dishwasher .. 5 of them came out cloudy and with marks I could not remove. what is going on?? this is the third time I try to review the product but Amazon will not post it!!
customer_reviews.author: Paolo in giovane e bella e mi sono adessoè arrivata wwaa

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly durable and good looking
customer_reviews.text: The box says these are dishwasher safe and you can expect to hand these glasses to your grandchildren as an heirloom because they will retain their quality. I believe it. I've tried to abuse these glasses (dropping them, dishwasher, using them as kids cups, etc.) and haven't found a scratch or blemish. On the shelf and in the hand, they look like glass. I'm having great fun dropping these for the un-initiated.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Look Incredible But Have One Drawback
customer_reviews.text: The glasses look amazing and you really can't tell they aren't glass just by looking at them. They wash easy and of course don't break so They serve their purpose well. The only small drawback is that we are use to wine glasses that are thin around the top, of course that's why they break. These are not thin on top and actually appear flat not rounded and you can definitely feel it when you drink. But they look incredible and we can use them in the hot tub and not worry about getting glass in the spa from breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Herd

customer_reviews.title: These glasses were totally defective. They clouded up so ...
customer_reviews.text: These glasses were totally defective. They clouded up so badly after only 1 use that you could barely even see through them. Finger prints were permanently embedded in the plastic. Had to return the entire order.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday Wine Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I just got these Vivocci Wine Glasses for everyday usage. I unpacked and checked them, I was suprised by the real feeling of the real glass in this item for the such small price. While I was washing them, I knocked one glass over on my granite kitchen counter and I got the other surprise, the glass was just bouncing like a ball and I didn't find any scratch or chip on the glass. And the third surprise was pleasant too, the glass keeps natural color of the wine. Good job guys, I am thinking to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, unbreakable!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because our wine glasses routinely break in the dishwasher, and I am not about to start washing dishes by hand. These are beautiful, and each holds a 1/2 bottle of wine! My kids use them for juice and milk, I use for wine and water. They have come out fine in the dishwasher, although I'm sure it's not the best way to clean them. I will deal inevitable scratches because I am lazy. These are great! Do not hesitate!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cloudy Marks
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Airbnb at the Pool so I would not have to worry about breakage. But, after a few washings they all appear scratched and have cloudy marks that do not come off. They look like they have dirty fingerprints on them. Apparently this is from sunscreen on peoples hands. So, what good are they for pool glasses? They are unusable at this point.
customer_reviews.author: RDB

customer_reviews.title: Cloud up and fog with certain liquors - DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: The MONEY BACK warranty is only for the 30 days via Amazon. We served Arak which is anise based liquor over ice and the glasses fogged and clouded up. The money back is only via Amazon's 30 day return policy. We initially liked the glasses when we entertained. No more. I've used them 3 or 4 times. Disappointing and deceptive in that they don't note in their money back that it is only for 30 days. If Amazon keeps selling deceptive vendors, they will destroy their own name, too.
customer_reviews.author: gogowiz1

customer_reviews.title: Very plastic looking
customer_reviews.text: They don't look like glass at all. Also, they aren't comfortable to hold -- too big around. So......I've already notified Amazon I'm returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The thickness of the rim (almost sharp) and that you can see mold seams on each side from top to bottom is unacceptable. Surprised these had such high rating.
customer_reviews.author: JLY

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: These are well made highly functional plastic glasses. I wanted them for use outdoors and on the patio. They are a comfortable weight and are a big step up from disposable plastic. That said, you could visually mistake them for glass, but once you touch them it's obvious that they're not. the 'seam' others have mentioned is there, but you have to hold the glass up to the light and rotate it to find it; in other words it's a non-issue. There's also a round 'frosted' dot underneath the glass; also, for me, a non-issue. I have seen more impressive and equally more expensive plastic drink ware, but you'd be hard pressed to beat these for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Puppymom

customer_reviews.title: Material has stains BUT amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: Update - I updated my review to 4 stars after the seller responded to my inquiry and sent me a replacement. Given the time that passed since I placed the order I really didn’t expect this. Amazing customer service! Original review - I've been using these glasses for a few months and been generally happy with them. They've been washed in the top rack of the dishwasher. However, they recently started to show stains/discoloration that seems to be inside the plastic since it does not come off with any soap or detergent that I have used. Disappoinbted.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie the Pooh

customer_reviews.title: Too pretty to be plastic!
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses! They are gorgeous and hold everything we drink from Orange juice to wine without staining. Clean up is a breeze. I hand wash all my dishes so not sure how they would or wouldn't hold up with dishwasher....but they look great, have a better feel than other plastic cups/glasses and are durable. These are sexy glasses and far and away so much nicer from the old red coke plastic glasses we used to use just because they were unbreakable. Being lighter weight and unbreakable makes these glasses fabulous for R.V. camping, use by the pool, or hot tub, or picnics in the park. You don't have to sacrifice beauty for drability!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Great for Putting a Drink in and Acting Casual
customer_reviews.text: Got these to drink juice out of. So I only picked up two because I didn't need any more. I have broken a wine glass on accident before, but these are great for what I need and can hold quite a lot. The cups feel a little big in my hand, but that's because I'm short with smaller hands. Overall, would recommend if you want to feel a little classy while being casual, but would not gift unless they were looking for party or pool glasses due to the very visible seams in the plastic that you can feel somewhat when you hold them. Otherwise they look and work great.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Inferior Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought 6 boxes of these glasses and was excited to have them for outdoor use. We washed them only on the top rack of our dishwasher. Now they are all so cloudy and marked now we would be embarrassed to serve them to guests. Sadly this company only offers a 30 day refund. They are ruined and will go in the garbage. This is an inferior product and I would never recommend. Can’t believe made this investment and now have to toss all 6 boxes !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good find
customer_reviews.text: I have a toddler who loves to take everything so I needed to find some decent looking plastic cups that could withstand her possibly getting ahold of them. I love that these hold so much liquid and don’t look cheap or scream plastic. I use one of these all day long for water and it’s been great. The edge around the top feels a little weird and cheap when you go to drink but it’s not a huge deal. It doesn’t cut you or anything I just feel that it’s noticeable and would be nice if it was rounded off more.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Substantial, unbreakable
customer_reviews.text: This beautiful pair of stemless wine glasses arrive in a lovely box, suitable for gift or travel. They are a nice thickness and weight and crystal clear. I was afraid that they would be too big, but they are the perfect size for a classy wine pour; the size you would have in a nice restaurant. I used them for travel, and they were perfect for that. They will also be great at home, because I am known for breaking wine glasses. I would highly recommend them to anyone who wants a nice unbreakable wine glass.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn G.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Sensibly Packaged
customer_reviews.text: These are attractive, very clear glasses with some heft (considering they are plastic). I wish they would make a wider range, from shot glasses to martini glasses to champagne flutes, as I would gladly replace my entire collection of glassware.
customer_reviews.author: StraightShooter

customer_reviews.title: Cheap look and feel
customer_reviews.text: Developed cloudy appearance fairly quickly. Looks and feels cheap and the rim isn't comfortable to drink from because it's not smooth. I went to the dollar store and found replacements in glass - same shape and size for way less money. They obviously have quality control issues - no way this product would be so highly rated if they got the subpar, overpriced product I did. A total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Above Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: These glasses are exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I am planning another trip to an all inclusive in Mexico. They have cafeteria style plastic glasses to drink beverages in the pool. I decided I wanted my drinks to look more elegant for more complete enjoyment. These glasses are perfect. They look like glass, but are unbreakable and dishwasher safe. I have some other similar glasses that I have had for years and they still look like new. I will send you a picture from Mexico so you can see what I am talking about. Stay tuned.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ekren

customer_reviews.title: 3 Year Review
customer_reviews.text: I've had these glasses for three years now. I bought them because I have a lot of small kids in the house and was tired of glass getting broken. I liked the look of glass, however, and these were the perfect fix. I feel like they look just like glass. They are a little lighter when you pick them up. I've had almost no cloudiness, scratches, or discoloring. They have not become brittle or cracked. I would definitely buy again as they far exceeded my expectations. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DrK

customer_reviews.title: plastic wine glass that a wine snob will like
customer_reviews.text: We are wine snobs. We drink a lot of wine. We use high end stemware. We also sit at our hot tub and pool. Broken glass outside would be no fun. They are stemware that I will use inside without a second thought. The lip of the goblet feels like glass. They are really sturdy! We take these in our suitcases on our travels. A month in and out of a suitcase and good as new. They hold up in a dishwasher. The cheaper kind can get destroyed and or misshapen.
customer_reviews.author: MLC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our vacation condo
customer_reviews.text: This is our second buy so I expect these to arrive just as well as my first set. Perfect for our vacation condo. We can take them to the pool without the worry of them breaking. They are not as heavy as real glass. You can't tell they aren't real glass until you pick them up. We've had our first set for a couple months now and they are holding up well even after plenty of rounds through the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: katrina

customer_reviews.title: Best wine glasses I've come across!! If you need wine glasses, get these!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for about a month now and I love them! At first I was a little unsure of having plastic wine glasses, with my concern being they would lack elegance. The plastic looks just like glass and they have the same look of regular wine glasses. What makes them even better is they are durable enough to put them in the dishwasher and not worry if you get tipsy/clumsy or your pets knock them over! They are also very large if you like having big glasses of wine like me...hahah.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Nice plastic, still not glass
customer_reviews.text: These things are probably as good as it gets for plastic cups, but for some reason, no matter how nice the plastic is, it still looks like plastic and not glass. It must be something about the refraction of the light or something. I don't know. But for unbreakable plastic, they do what they say they will do.
customer_reviews.author: Roswell979

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Durability and Safe - Most Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the Vivocci Unbreakable Plastic Stemless Wine glasses for a family party & boy were they a hit. They fit our needs perfectly. The quality of this product is definitely 5 stars. No worries when one topples off the edge of the table or slips from your hand, no shards or splinters of glass for the toddlers or pets to step on. The rims on each and every "glass" was smooth, no sharp edges as in simalar products. They wash and dry crystal clear, even after multiple uses. No scratches, no clouding, they look as good as the day we received them. We are extremely pleased and will not hesitate to order again.
customer_reviews.author: Clova

customer_reviews.title: Recommend these
customer_reviews.text: These glasses look great. I got them so my girlfriend and I could drink wine poolside. Before you buy them, make sure you are aware that there are only two in the box. I normally check that stuff, but this time I didn't and I soon for the price that we get four. After all they are plastic. Still though I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Tom

customer_reviews.title: Instead of disposable plastic ware at restaurants due to Covid-19
customer_reviews.text: Bought these glasses to take to places where wine would be served in disposable plastic ware. This looks like glassware! I can see taking these on boats, music festivals, etc
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Big and durable
customer_reviews.text: We have always used a glass in the bathroom. But of course you are talking about glass in the bathroom and that isn’t always a good plan. So when I saw these I got them. But I didn’t really stop to think of how large a 20 ounce glass is. That is over 2 cups! Nevertheless we use them and are happy to know that they are unbreakable.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Drink your wine by the pool
customer_reviews.text: We use these glasses to drink with our friends in and around our pool and hot tub. We're all responsible adults but accidents happen. We don't want to worry about missing pieces of broken glasses around our pool. These glasses look like traditional glass glasses but they just won't break. Also, they're pretty big so you can pour yourself a generous glass without looking like a total lush.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Charles Anderson

customer_reviews.title: So far these seem great
customer_reviews.text: They seem very sturdy and are dishwashable which is key. The last plastic wine glasses I bought were too thin and warped in the hot water of the dishwasher - not these. These stand up well and seem like they'll last awhile. Do I still prefer glass? Yes. But when you need plastic wine glasses (beach, pool, etc.) these are a nice choice.
customer_reviews.author: Tri Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, poor quality: finger marks do not clean
customer_reviews.text: The glass look and feel nice, however after two times we used and washed by hand, they stained very badly: finger prints all over that do not go away no matter how many you wash them. Not recommended and looking to get a refund
customer_reviews.author: Davide Tripodi

customer_reviews.title: If you have a swimming pool, buy these glasses.
customer_reviews.text: Having broken more than one beverage glass while around sitting around the pool, these glasses are the answer. Not breakable, not cheap plastic, they are perfect for the time around the pool or any other place where you do not want to deal with broken glass. We've gifted them plus bought them for ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Westech

customer_reviews.title: These glasses look good
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift, so I cannot rate durability, versatility nor the ease of cleaning. Five stars because they look nice...just like glass, but that is what I would expect out of the box. I know from experience with this type of plastic, it will see wear from washing and dishwasher use. That's the nature of plastic. That being said, they are a great alternative to glass with outdoor use. I'm sure the recipients will love them.
customer_reviews.author: DBLCRJ

customer_reviews.title: Unbreakable!
customer_reviews.text: I just elbowed one of these glasses onto the floor today. I watched it bounce around without breaking and it reminded me to write a review! Truly unbreakable! The plastic they are made out of hasn’t scratched or gotten dull from the dishwasher after 3 months of use and they have been dropped or knocked over several times.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect and I actually literally dropped it twice after getting ...
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect and I actually literally dropped it twice after getting it, lol. Pretty clumsy of me. They look beautiful, feel great without the stem, and guarantee they won't shatter on you no matter how how you drop them from. Can't even tell they're plastic until you hold it. Great "glasses".
customer_reviews.author: Sloane

customer_reviews.title: Not seeing double
customer_reviews.text: These work well while we camp. Only issue I have is there were only two glasses in the cup and they advertise a picture of three. I went back and read and it says only comes with two. Just felt like it was misleading but i could have read the fine print and known. Guess I’ll have to drink a glass of wine and pout now! 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: If you want plastic wine glasses, buy these
customer_reviews.text: My wife and daughter are bad about dropping wine glasses on our patio and deck. Ihave small grandchildren who run around barefooted and glass slivers would really be an issue. Trying to clean up the glass completely is really difficult so I bought two sets of these wine glasses. They look like glass and drink like glass, but are plastic. We are very pleased with them and it has solved the problem of breaking wine glasses on the porch and patio. I highly recommend them to the other dudes that would be stuck with cleaning up shattered glass wine glasses!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Two glasses ruined--first time used :-(
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use by our pool. They are beautiful--a nice hefty size and they look like glass. After our Labor Day Pool party yesterday, I hand washed these and realized that two of the glasses were handled with sunscreen lotion hands. I now have cloudy, blotchy fingerprints that will not come off. I've tried white vinegar and Dawn detergent. No change. I am incredibly disappointed. How do you tell people not to touch their glass after they use sunscreen? So much for outdoor versatility--I guess you can only use these after dark when you don't need sunscreen. So, so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Indestructible and looks like crystal glass
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be more pleased! They're crystal clear and rim on glasses feel the same on one's lips on glass. I dropped one on my porcelain tile plank floor and it didn’t crack. I mostly wash by hand, but occasionally use the top rack of dishwasher. Giftable. Comes in a nice box.
customer_reviews.author: TweedleDee

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Looks like crystal clear glass
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Looks like crystal clear glass. They are elegant yet tough with very little flex. No edgy plastic mold relief areas either. One cannot tell they are plastic unless you thoroughly examine them. Great for wine on the back porch with no worries of broken glass. Classy enough to serve any guest. Will see how they hold up to wear and tear and scratching. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great unbreakable outdoors wine glass.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what happened to those reviewers who had their glasses turn cloudy to opaque on their first trip thru the dishwasher. Mine have been through at least a dozen times now and they are as nice as when I pulled them out of the box. Thanks to my cats they have hit the floor several times on my porch and they haven even been scratched. I would have liked them to be a little thinner at the rim but it is not problem in anyway. If you are looking for a pair of outdoor rugged wine classes that look nice then this is the pair for you
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these unbreakable "glasses" to take with us to Ireland on our trip to celebrate our anniversary. They were perfect! They are lightweight but sturdy construction, easily packable in checked luggage, crystal clear and with an edge that is not too thick that it ruins the drinking experience. They have only been used a couple of times, so I don't know how easily they might scratch up; didn't use with ice cubes - wine only, so far. For now, they met my needs beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine glasses for the outside patio
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are a large size, and maybe hard to hold for some, but since they are plastic you can grip them more easily than glass versions. They do have a seam in them, which is not evident when you look at them on-line, but after a while you forget about that so it should not be a deal breaker. Not worth the return process to get another brand. They were a good price compared to others I checked out.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Schlossberg

customer_reviews.title: Great product at great price
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased these types of plastic wine glasses in the past and they have always had a rough part at the lip, which would become very annoying. These are very smooth and look just like real glasses. The other issue we have had in the past is that the glasses get cloudy after a few washes. We have washed these in the dishwasher a few times and they look very clear. I am very satisfied with these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Eric A.

customer_reviews.title: Smart Choice & Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: They were a gift and the recipients loved them and will probably order more. They are a bit pricey, but with the price comes excellence and that is what I hoped for and was not disappointed. I wanted a classy wine glass for around the pool and patio. They arrived on time and in good condition. Also, thanks for the great follow up on your company's part. I don't think I have ever been treated that way from any company. So kudos on all points.
customer_reviews.author: d raquepo

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I puchased these plastic mugs for breakfast beverages and it serves that purpose well. Nice quality and super clear, however, I don't know and will never know what a dishwasher could do to them. I give them 4-stars because one of them has a dark blemish near the base and it wasn't worth sending the set back.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set of plastic glasses.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a cheaper set from another manufacture. Boy was I sorry. Every time I try and cheap my way out of something, I'm always sorry. So after throwing the other set out I bought the Vivocci glasses. What a difference. they were more money than the other set, but worth every penny. I love these glasses. If you want a nice heavy set of plastic glasses (I use them when I'm in the hot tub) these are perfect. They are heavy feeling, weighted base. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Skip Bradlee

customer_reviews.title: Answer to our problem !
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter would break our wine glasses every night weather it was a plate that toppled over or finding a crack. We haven't had to replace any since trying this item I couldn't tell the difference with the cups when I campared them feels and looks just like glass but doesn't break like glass this is such an awesome innovated product ! So glad I found the answer to our problems!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Nice 20 Oz plastic wine glass.
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth set of different types of plastic wine glasses. I prefer the 20 ounce as appossed to the 13 ouncers. At first glance not much difference. Feels light in the hand. But took a star off due to a noticeable spot on the bottom outside of the plastic. Looks to me that these are manufactured from a stem glass and then they clipped the stem off on the bottom. I noticed it but most wont. There is also a slight seam on the side but all of them have it. If you want a nice 13 oz. go for the Cruvina.
customer_reviews.author: James Marino

customer_reviews.title: Crisp and clear after six months of use
customer_reviews.text: Six months of use and washing them and a dishwasher, and they still look new. Slightly larger than the usual stemless wine glass, but that works because they are less likely to overflow. They have performed much better than we expected – – I thought they would get cloudy with use and washing. But they have not. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lawyer Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Durable snd look like glass!!
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered 2 boxes of these glasses for an outdoor patio party earlier this Spring- I have just reordered another 2 boxes ( total 32 glasses) for a Fall party I am hosting. These glasses are practically seamless and look like glass! They haven’t discolored , so far, in the dishwasher as many plastic glasses do. I’ve also used glass markers on them so guests can identify their drinks, and the markers have washed easily off. I’d absolutely recommend these!!
customer_reviews.author: LAS

customer_reviews.title: Definitely won’t break
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I got the same product as the people who say they have a ‘real glass feel’. They are definitely plastic in every way. There’s also a seam on the side that is more felt than seen. For the purpose of not breaking whilst being a goblet shape, though, they meet the requirements.
customer_reviews.author: mleet87

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I like that they are unbreakable. I have watched my precious Riedel glasses hit the floor with a resounding tinkle of broken glass. I am down to one. These glasses look good feel good in your hand and no matter what anyone does, they don’t break.
customer_reviews.author: Kam the Librarian

customer_reviews.title: Great for outside!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for outside dinners. Durable and safeif dropped yet dont looklike plastice cups.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Nicest plastic glasses I owned. They are really pretty and the lip is Comfortable to drink from. I HATE plastic glasses but I don't mind using these at all. Bought for my clumsy husband and he likes them also. Ps wash by hand only.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect red wine glass for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: These stainless wine glasses are very clear and elegant looking with a good balance. I have placed these in the dishwasher 5 times so far, and they look just as good as they did out of the box. Size is that of a normal red wine glass.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to make my cocktails. So far, I love the feel of holding them. The taste of my cocktails is not affected negatively, and I love the fact that I do not have this constant fear that they will shatter if I drop them. I love the large 20 ounce size of these beautiful glasses. I would recommend them to anyone who likes to enjoy an occasional relaxing drink.
customer_reviews.author: Andy-j

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these cups for camping and they are perfect. I ran them through the dishwasher on the top shelf and they came out crystal clear. I agree the top rim is thicker than a standard wine glass, but it was not bothersome to me. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Starr

customer_reviews.title: I have been using these for several weeks not and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for several weeks not and they seem to retain their 'glass-like' finish. Had similar plastic glasses from a local store which became scratched and duill - these seem much higher quality. Haven't washed 'em in the dishwasher yet, that will be the final test.
customer_reviews.author: Righteous Reader

customer_reviews.title: I Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice "glasses". They certainly look like glass! They feel nice in the hand, good size for drinks or parfait type desserts. They don't seem to scratch. Since getting them, I've used them almost every day! Great for summer patio use! Seller also sent nice personal note-a nice touch! I recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: jmb02129

customer_reviews.title: The perfect alternative to glass juice glasses
customer_reviews.text: Excellent plastic glasses. We bought these glasses for our family as an alternative to glass juice glasses and they have been great. Unlike many other plastic cups we have had in the past, these glasses can actually go in the dishwasher without any change to shape or appearance. We have washed them dozens of time and they still appear brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses. My only gripe is they get condensation like crazy, and when they do they are very hard to hold own to due to the shape of the glass. Room temp liquids work best. Very durable, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tiki

customer_reviews.title: Love these glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much, I've ordered 12 of them. They are not 'cheap' plastic glasses - they have substance. I used them for guests that were drinking cocktails, wine, or water. They are fantastic. I'll still use the good stuff for formal events, but for casual parties, these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Vivocci for the win.
customer_reviews.text: For being plastic wine glasses they are alot thicker then other ones i have purchased. They seem to be pretty durable and will be a great addition to my upcoming camping trips. Customer service appears to be really good answering questions for this product as well. Im really beginning to like the Vivocci brand.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are find and appear to be of good quality. There is a faintly noticeable seam which kind of surprised me, and the thickness is about half of what I expected. But for the price, I think they are a decent buy
customer_reviews.author: K. Chumley

customer_reviews.title: Nice glass when you are outdoors.
customer_reviews.text: The glasses look nice, although they were a little thicker than I expected. It was great to have a nice glass while camping and not worry about it breaking. They do scratch easily, as just traveling with them touching produced scratches in both, but not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great Wine Glasses
customer_reviews.text: These wine glasses are Better than I expected. I can put them in the dishwasher, and have come out looking great, even after many washes, I've had not crackling or fogged up glasses. These are a must around the pool. One has even been dropped on cement, without a scratch! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: DiamondGirl

customer_reviews.title: Don't put in dishwasher!
customer_reviews.text: These say dishwasher safe. I put the beautiful, extremely clear glasses on the top rack of my dishwasher. After washing, I was disappointed to see that they were no longer extremely clear as before. They looked slightly cloudy. I wish I could find some plastic clear glasses that did look as good as new after washing in the dishwasher on the top rack. If anyone has found some, please tell us what brand. I thought it sounded too good to be true and I was right! They are beautiful glasses but I would recommend hand washing only.
customer_reviews.author: S Allen

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully crafted yet functional
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Simply amazing, sturdy but beautifully crafted tumblers, light enough but still feeling great. We purchased this glass for our informal breakfast glasses. We have poured in milk, juices, waters and liquid yogurt. Also we use it as informal glass for afternoon drinks. It is great for small hands of children. Very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Trinca

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase and product.
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses. They look just like glass. I have them sitting right next to the glasses! They are extremely light when I hold them so they feel like plastic. Great for people like me in an apartment with carpet everywhere or for people with large families where accidents just happen a lot. Only counted off because they still feel light and like plastic, I was thinking it would be a harder, thicker type of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey M.

customer_reviews.title: A real step up from the Red Solo Cup
customer_reviews.text: Look. I'm a college student. I cannot be trusted with /real/ stemless wine glasses, but I want to drink my vodka cranberries out of the finest of glassware. Impress your friends with these things! They really do look exactly like glass, but you can drop them as many times as you want and they won't crack. Makes for a great party trick to drop them in front of people. However, if you're a real grown-ass adult, please purchase real glasses because these are tacky unless you're in college.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Kozukhin

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to clean
customer_reviews.text: No matter how I try to clean the glasses, they always have fingerprints and look dirty. A waste of money. Donating them to the thrift store...
customer_reviews.author: L. Ashby

customer_reviews.title: Good Price and Design
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for the pool and spa area; they are thick plastic that is comfortable to hold and not at all sharp on the edges. I have had plastic glasses before that seemed sharp/rough on the rim, and these have no issues. I have used them for several months now and I am happy with them. I wash them on the top shelf of the dishwasher and no issues. Overall very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Moose

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift for Enjoying "Wine-To-Go"
customer_reviews.text: These glasses were a gift for my daughter-in-law for her birthday. We often sit outside and enjoy a glass of wine while we visit and watch my grandchildren play -- and I am always thinking that I'll drop one of her wine glasses and break it. When I saw these I knew I'd found the perfect gift -- functional enough for an outdoor party or enjoying the grandchildren. Or pretty enough for serving dinner guests!
customer_reviews.author: B. Gaddy

customer_reviews.title: Great design !
customer_reviews.text: These glasses look like glass! Beautiful shape and the lip is very comfortable. Like that I can put cold or hot liquids in it. Bought to use out on our patio....but now use them indoors too! Good looking; and nice box if you need to give it as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn M.

customer_reviews.title: solid, good value
customer_reviews.text: I just got these, so can't speak to their long-term durability, but they've been through the dishwasher once without issue. They are solid, thick, reasonably well-made, though nothing fancy. For picnics and situations where you need to avoid the potential for broken glasses, they do the job,
customer_reviews.author: chelidon

customer_reviews.title: Good wine glasses
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these not even realizing they were plastic, they are awesome though. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Tip-proof, Break-proof... Great for Active Families & Outdoors
customer_reviews.text: We love our new unbreakable glasses. The wife has already tested the unbreakable part; dropped one full of wine on the concrete patio. We use them indoor and out. They are sort-of tip-proof; once liquid is in them, they are so bottom heavy that accidentally hitting one will not tip it over... great for rambunctious pets or children in the house, or just klutzy adults for that matter.
customer_reviews.author: Dal

customer_reviews.title: Great unbreakable wine classes
customer_reviews.text: These wine glasses are especially great for use outdoors, on the patio or camping. They are elegantly large and heavy in the base to prevent spills.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie A.

customer_reviews.title: Ok glasses
customer_reviews.text: I like a stemless glass for tip resistance and easier cleaning. Dislike the weight of the “glass” ...too light and feels like plastic which it is. Went through the dishwasher satisfactorily Durability I yet to be determined.
customer_reviews.author: Chipboarder

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love these and will buy again. Only thing I noticed was after a couple times in the dishwasher, one of them started to get a little cloudy....but these are truly a fantastic product!!!
customer_reviews.author: colts

customer_reviews.title: Jlust in time for Sangria!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these glasses to take to the River around the fire pit. And we plan to pour sangria into them. They look sturdy and are not heavy.. I was glad to find them on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: C. Trout

customer_reviews.title: stemless wine glasses
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are great for the pool area, however after one use the clear plastic became cloudy and looks dirty even when they are washed by hand......
customer_reviews.author: mark P

customer_reviews.title: Great wine glasses, but....
customer_reviews.text: I love these stemless wine glasses. They are sturdy and went through the dishwasher well. However, I bought them to use by my pool. Shortly after receiving them I received an email stating that they should not be used if wearing lipstick, lotion, or sunscreen, because it will leave permanent smudges. WHAT! The email did say that if that happens, to notify the owner and that they will be replaced. Since I bought 2 sets for an upcoming pool party, I certainly will!
customer_reviews.author: Vernon Bartley

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks and feel of the wine glasses. Since it came advertised as being heavy based glassware, I found them to be not as heavy as expected. I haven't had them long enough to answer about their durability. As far as being giftable, it would depend on whether someone would want plastic glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: My husband bought these for me!
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad habit of knocking my glass over and have broken several.. I normally don’t like to drink out of plastic glasses, but these are different. Not like my Waterford, but a good alternative. You really don’t feel like you are drinking out of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Great look, feel and value
customer_reviews.text: We use these Vivocci glasses for red and white wine on our patio and in our hot tub. Great hand feel, light weight but looks and feels like glass. I dropped one on the kitchen hardwood floor and it bounced but didn't break. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: well made, doesn't feel cheap
customer_reviews.text: With a small child in the house, glassware doesn't work very well for us.. I love this set in that it seems super well made, doesn't feel flimsy or cheap, and the glass size is great for drinks, ice cream sundaes or yogurt parfaits.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey R.

customer_reviews.title: Good for picnics or boating
customer_reviews.text: I bought these glasses to use on a sailboat. They are easy to store, and easy to clean. Very stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Kerstein

customer_reviews.title: Good feel and very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Got these primarily for my wife as she always worries about breaking our wine glasses. She loves them. They are a little thicker than glassware, but I have mistakenly grabbed her glass and had a few sips and not even noticed that it wasn't my glass. They have survived many trips through the dishwasher and still look great.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce V.

customer_reviews.title: Looks like glass
customer_reviews.text: These stemless wine glasses met all of my expectations. Don't look like plastic, but are very durable and look great. After breaking a stemless glass one on my tile floor, this is exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lowery Nix

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for over 2 years and going- perfect holds the right amount I use everyday to drink water while at work during the day and when I get home. Only downside is the grip - its a bit wide for the hands.
customer_reviews.author: Shasky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for klutzes like me!
customer_reviews.text: These wine glasses look real but are definitely safer than regular wine glasses. They're easier to clean because even though the plastic is extremely durable, there is so flexibility to them so you can safely clean the inside without risking the glass breaking (been there, done that). I generally prefer shatterproof/unbreakable dishes and this was a good find.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must if you have granite countertops.
customer_reviews.text: I have granite countertops, and while they are gorgeous, they have claimed a TON of my glassware over the years. These unbreakable glasses are an answer to my prayers! I saw these at a friend's house who plans to use them in his restaurant. They are perfect! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: ERIC FLETCHER

customer_reviews.title: They are plastic
customer_reviews.text: For those like me who aren’t sure. They are plastic (probably a duh to most but I wasn’t sure) and look very plastics when you take them out. But for the price they are good.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Dunker

customer_reviews.title: Multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these to use in the pool area. I washed them and put in the cupboard as pool is still being built. My family won’t stop using them! They love them for everything from water, to milk to an adult beverage. Easy to hold, light weight but not super light, feel very durable. They wash nice in the dishwasher (top rack). We may need to get more!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K

customer_reviews.title: Cleans easily and seems sturdy for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 packages of 8 for indoor and outdoor use. Just as described. Have only used it a few times. Cleans easily and seems sturdy for outdoors. When empty, tumbles over easily though, but does not break.
customer_reviews.author: DebSuds

product_meta.title: Vivocci Unbreakable Elegant Plastic Stemless Wine Glasses 20 oz | 100% Tritan Heavy Base | Shatterproof Glassware | Ideal For Cocktails & Scotch | Perfect For Homes & Bars | Dishwasher-Proof, Set of 4
feature_bullets: SUPERIOR TRITAN INDESTRUCTIBLE BUILD: This unique set of drinking glasses is made out of superior Tritan copolyester that makes each glass impact and shatter resistant. This premium material feels and looks like glass but it's far more durable than any other plain glass or plastic drinkware set out there. Feel free to get as clumsy as you want with our glasses, and enjoy your favorite beverages at home, patio or any pool, boating, camping, picnic, hiking or outdoors excursion that you wish!

ONE GLASS-UNLIMITED DRINKS: Our glassware is designed for heavy duty, daily use so that you can enjoy all your favorite beverages, drinks and even use it as a stylish bowl to have your breakfast or enjoy other delicious recipes in. Enjoy anything from wine, martinis, coca cola, vodka, gin, cognac, bourbon, margaritas, juices, soda to simply refreshing water with our premium glass set. Plus, their sleek, attractive design will make for killer presentation on any party or entertaining occasion!

100% DISHWASHER SAFE: There’s a reason why all of our customers would buy again our glasses in a heartbeat; our supreme quality. The premium Tritan material is BPA-free, BPS, EA and AA-free, contains absolutely ZERO toxic chemicals and is bound to withstand hundreds of washing cycles and falls. Each glass is clear, odorless, and undergoes rigorous 3rd party tests so that maximum quality and safety is guaranteed for you and your family.

THE PERFECT HOUSEWARMING GIFT: If you're looking for a highly useful, thoughtful and elegant gift for new homeowners, newlyweds or just any Birthday, Wedding, Christmas, Mother's Day etc. this unique set of glasses is bound to be an instant favorite! Choose from our set of 2, 4, 8 glasses and we promise you'll be golden!

"VIVOCCI" - THE NAME YOU CAN TRUST: Here at Vivocci we strive to provide each and every customer with the best buying experience and product possible since it's YOU, who keeps us going strong. Every barware set is fully backed by a 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE for you to feel absolutely safe in your purchase. If for any reason you're not satisfied, simply return the glasses for a swift and full refund. Click Add To Cart Now and Grab the Most RISK-FREE Glassware Deal on Amazon!
